attributes.additional_details:
I am a football fan who is disillusioned with the way that our football clubs are run.  By large, football clubs are no longer regarded as to serve the community they are in and are purely for money making purposes. This is ruining a game loved by millions.
Keeping our clubs not-for-profit organisations will ensure all profits are reinvested into the club and guarantee that success is shared by the community and not kept by wealthy individuals.
